product_description: Transform your garage or utility room into a cozy oasis with the Mr Heater 5,000/4,000/3,000W 240V Ceiling Mount Garage/Utility Heater. Engineered for space-saving efficiency, this heater features a ceiling-mounted design, freeing up valuable floor space. Constructed with durable all-metal materials, it's built to withstand the rigors of daily use. The adjustable louvers allow you to direct the airflow precisely where it's needed, while the adjustable tilt head lets you customize the heat direction for optimal comfort. With fan-forced technology, this heater ensures wide heat circulation throughout your space. Easily adjust the temperature with the adjustable thermostat, and enjoy peace of mind with overheat protection. The 240V/30A hardwire connection ensures reliable power delivery, while the easy-to-use mechanical controls make operation a breeze. Choose between high, medium, and low heat settings (5000/4000/3000 watt) to suit your heating needs. Perfect for spaces up to 590 sq. ft., this heater is the ideal solution for keeping your garage or utility room warm and comfortable all year round.

product_description: Dura Heat Forced Air Electric Garage Heater, 1500W PTC Ceramic, Rugged Steel Body, Thermostat, High Velocity Fan, 6 ft Power Cord, Heats Up To 250 Sq Ft, Safety Shut-Off - Garage and Greenhouse Heater This Dura Heat Electric Forced Air Heater is designed to deliver efficient and powerful warmth to your small spaces, making it an ideal choice for garages, workshops, greenhouses, or other work areas. With 1500 watts of PTC ceramic heating, this compact yet effective electric heater quickly heats areas up to 250 square feet. The unit features a rugged, steel construction built to withstand the demands of commercial use and heavy-duty environments, while its lightweight design and convenient carrying handle make it easy to transport and position wherever you need extra warmth. Equipped with an adjustable thermostat, this heater allows you to set the ideal temperature, ensuring consistent comfort in your workspace. Its high-velocity fan distributes hot air evenly, effectively circulating warmth throughout the room and making it an excellent hot air circulator. You’ll appreciate the dual functionality of this heater, as it includes both a heat setting and a fan-only mode, which lets you use the fan for air circulation during warmer months. Safety is a top priority with this Dura Heat model. It comes with an overheat shut-off feature that automatically turns the unit off if it reaches unsafe temperatures, offering peace of mind during extended use. The 6-foot power cord with a polarized plug provides ample reach for convenient placement, while the stable base stand ensures secure positioning on various surfaces. Customers love this portable ceramic heater for its reliable performance and heat output. Many have found it ideal as a small electric heater for indoor and workspace use, with its powerful fan and efficient heating elements making it especially effective in smaller rooms. Its compact design also allows it to fit comfortably in areas with limited space, adding warmth without getting in the way. Whether you need a garage heater, or a portable electric heater for your workspace, this model combines efficiency, safety, and portability in a compact package.

product_description: Add Warmth and Comfort to Your Garage or Indoor Shop Space with a Fan-Forced Electric Heater If you’re someone who routinely spends time working out or working hard in their garage, workshop, or other commercial space you know how cold it can get in the winter months. And if you don’t have a high-quality heater to keep your space warm it’s either completely unusable or miserably cold. That’s why we developed the Zipdiz 4800W Electric Garage Heater with full-function remote. This premium indoor heater mounts to the ceiling and provides warm, reliable heat distribution across a large garage or shop space, so you can continue using the space no matter the season. Easy to install and designed to give you more control over your heating needs, this is a must-have for indoor areas that need to stay warm year-round or in colder months. Product Details: 1: 4800W Electric Garage Heater 2: Full-Function Remote Control 3: LED Touchscreen Display 4: Two (2) Heat Settings: AU(Automatic heating), Fan only. OFF. 5: Built-In Adjustable Thermostat 6: Overheating Protection 7: ETL Certified 8: Variable Mounting Angles 9: Adjustable Louvers Note: 1: Use only copper wires rated for at least 60℃ 2: Heater air flow must be directed parallel to or away from adjacent wall. 3: Observe all wall, floor and ceiling clearance requirements. 4: All wiring must be done according to national and local electrical codes. The heater must be grounded. Heater circuit must be protected with proper fuses. 5: The mounting structure and the anchoring hardware must be capable of supporting the weight of the heater and the mounting bracked(if used)

name: Electric Garage Heater for Indoor Use - 7500W, 240V Wall/Ceiling/Floor Mounted Shop Heater, Dual Overheat Protection & 3 Adjustable Angles, Industrial Heavy-Duty Heaters for Workshop, Warehouse
short_description: 【Powerful Dual Heat Settings - Fast Warmth】Step into a warm, cozy space in just minutes. With 5000W / 7500W dual heating power, this garage heater quickly chases away the chill and keeps the temperature steady, even on the coldest mornings. No more shivering while waiting for the room to warm up—just instant, powerful heat exactly when you need it.

【Precise Temperature Control - Your Comfort Zone】 Set the warmth exactly how you like with this electric garage heater. The adjustable range of 45°F–95°F with ±1°F accuracy lets you dial in your ideal temperature. A bright LED digital display shows real-time readings, so you can enjoy consistent, cozy warmth without constantly adjusting the controls.

【Smart Remote Operation - Total Convenience】 The full-function remote on this garage heater for indoor use lets you adjust temperature, switch modes, set a 1–12 hour timer, or change °C/°F—all without leaving your spot. After powering off, the fan runs an extra 90 seconds to safely release residual heat, providing easy, safe, and convenient operation for total comfort.

【Safe & Reliable - Heavy-Duty Performance】 This heater for garage features a 240V hardwired system, #8 75°C copper wire (note: additional copper wire needs to be purchased separately), and 45A fuse capacity for stable, heavy-duty operation day after day. Built-in overheat protection automatically shuts off the heating element if temperatures rise too high, ensuring safe and reliable performance for long-term use. Ideal for garages, workshops, basements, and storage spaces.

【Adjustable Airflow - Heat Where You Need It】 Every corner counts when it’s cold. The three-angle adjustable mounting bracket and multi-directional louvers on this shop heater let you aim warm air exactly where it’s needed. Whether directed down to a workbench or across the room, it provides consistent, even heating, keeping you comfortable and productive.
